name: mpbToSwitch
description: Add any kind of switch to a project by using simple momentary push buttons and this library to simulate the internal mechanism of each of them, starting from a Debounced Push Button and extending to Delayed Start Push Button, Toggle (Latched) Push Button, Time Latched Push Button, External Release Latched Push Button.
keywords: momentary, push, button, debounce, switch, latch, toggle, release, warning, security, staircase, timer
